description: A Dart class 'BookService' that manages user library and store of books, providing methods for searching, adding, removing, and retrieving books, along with mock data for books.

classes.name: BookService
classes.description: Handles user library management, store books, search, and synchronization.

methods.name: userLibrary
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of books in the user's library.

methods.name: availableBooks
methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable list of books available in the store.

methods.name: searchAllBooks
methods.description: Searches for books matching the query in title or author, excluding those already in the library.

methods.name: getBookById
methods.description: Retrieves a book by its identifier, returns null if not found.

methods.name: isInLibrary
methods.description: Checks if a book with the given ID is in the user's library.

methods.name: addToLibrary
methods.description: Adds a book to the user's library if not already present, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: removeFromLibrary
methods.description: Removes a book from the user's library by ID, and notifies listeners.
